content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
Every workday begins with me waking up feeling like I have a weight on my chest. I know this is not sustainable.
sounds like you are feeling stressed about work and are worried about your health.
I’m not one of those types who always does great at work and is just anxious that it’s not enough. My anxiety paralyzes me and I fall behind.
sounds like you are feeling stressed about your work and that you are not doing enough to make it through?

situation: My anxiety over work is a constant black hole in my life.
